WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Fixed.
Added ScrollHook class, and supporting code in the controls, that will enable the focus to correctly be passed from a child control to the CalculationDisplay or BuffSelector, enabling the scroll wheel to work as intended.
WorkItem.Description:
Build 22837 (b16.1 release):
Currently, the mouse scroll wheel does not work in either the CalculationDisplay or BuffSelector controls. A user would probably expect to be able to click in the control, and scroll to work.
WorkItem.Summary: [Buffs] Mouse scroll wheel does not work in CalculationDisplay and BuffSelector
